abstract: For the 2010 tournament, which is to run from June 21 through July 4, HSBC is stepping up its attempts to give New Yorkers a taste of tennis played on grass.
snippet: For the 2010 tournament, which is to run from June 21 through July 4, HSBC is stepping up its attempts to give New Yorkers a taste of tennis played on grass.
lead_paragraph: For the third consecutive year, the British bank HSBC is going wacky for Wimbledon in New York.
